title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added shell script `_convert-svgs.sh` to generate social card PNGs from SVG templates using `rsvg-convert` and `zopflipng`
Created SVG templates (`_default.svg`, `_template.svg`) for social card generation
Updated `find-orphaned-assets.ts` to include new social card PNGs in exceptions list
Expanded `DefaultLayout.tsx` to support social cards for additional product categories
Clarified Copilot agent only responds in open pull requests in troubleshooting docs
summary:
- Added shell script `_convert-svgs.sh` to generate social card PNGs from SVG templates using `rsvg-convert` and `zopflipng`
- Created SVG templates (`_default.svg`, `_template.svg`) for social card generation
- Generated 30+ product-specific social card PNGs (e.g., `account-and-profile.png`, `actions.png`)
- Updated `find-orphaned-assets.ts` to include new social card PNGs in exceptions list
- Expanded `DefaultLayout.tsx` to support social cards for additional product categories
- Clarified Copilot agent only responds in open pull requests in troubleshooting docs
generated_title: Add social card generation script and product-specific images

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added shell script `_convert-svgs.sh` to generate social card PNGs from SVG templates using `rsvg-convert` and `zopflipng`
- Created SVG templates (`_default.svg`, `_template.svg`) for social card generation
- Generated 30+ product-specific social card PNGs (e.g., `account-and-profile.png`, `actions.png`)
- Updated `find-orphaned-assets.ts` to include new social card PNGs in exceptions list
- Expanded `DefaultLayout.tsx` to support social cards for additional product categories
- Clarified Copilot agent only responds in open pull requests in troubleshooting docs

### Title
Add social card generation script and product-specific images
